name: Grow (itch) (Sigrath)
description:
Grow is my entry for Ludum Dare 30. It's an experimental game exploring the idea of managing different processes that are going on simultaneously. Things will either grow during the night or day. Spin the world around to see the effect growing has. Try out different effects to unlock all the endings. Please feel free to check out other games that I have made!

Note: As per Ludum Dare competition rules, I've included the source code for the game. The source code is for the original compo version that was uploaded.

Controls

Click on the world to spin it around.

Things grow either during the night or day.

Keep switching around to see the effect growing has.

The green bars at the bottom show health and the red bars show growth.

Try different combinations to get the different endings. Can you find them all?
